name: zirconium oxide to generic market for electrolyte, for solid oxide fuel cell | electrolyte, for solid oxide fuel cell | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/24603/documentation

This activity links zirconium oxide to the generic market for electrolyte used in solid oxide fuel cells, which is one of the possible applications of zirconium oxide (zirconia) (Zircon Industry Association, 2019).;The product "electrolyte, for solid oxide fuel cell" should be used only in cases where the specific electrolyte is not known. The two electrolytes that supply the market for electrolyte, for solid oxide fuel cell are scandium oxide and zirconium oxide.;Reference:;Zircon Industry Association (2019). Zircon's critical and unique uses. https://www.zircon-association.org/applications.html (last accessed on 2021-07-30).

The activity starts with the reception of zirconium oxide.

The activity ends with the renaming of zirconium oxide to a generic electrolyte, which supplies the market for electrolyte, for solid oxide fuel cell. As this is a renaming activity, no other inputs or outputs are included.
